description.paragraph1: Hi! I'm Kevin Gamez, the Founding Engineer at Enttor, the only outbound messaging platform startups need.
description.paragraph2: At Enttor, I architected the full-stack application from the ground up, building browser automation systems, and integrating AI pipelines that power personalized outreach at scale.
description.paragraph3: I have a Bachelor's and Master's in Information Engineering from Uniandes with a specialization in deep learning.

workItems.title: AI outbound, browser automation
workItems.description: Built Enttor's AI outbound engine and browser based automation flows for multi platform, automating prospecting, DMs and lead qualification.

workItems.title: Data analytics systems
workItems.description: Designed complex SQL models and analytics pipelines used Power BI to drive executive reporting in HR, risk, and operations across multiple corporate environments.

workItems.title: Deep learning and computer vision
workItems.description: Trained models on satellite imagery to detect croplands and environmental risk.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey and key milestones

samsam.description: Built and shipped shopper- and merchant-facing features while refactoring core backend services for a high-growth e-commerce startup.
achievements: Released a new checkout flow that increased conversion 12%
Refactored legacy Node micro-services, cutting P95 latency 40%
Introduced CI/CD with GitHub Actions — deployments 60% faster
responsibilities: Code reviews, mentoring and agile ceremonies

uniandes.description: Designed lab material and supported students across advanced CS courses while handling course operations.
achievements: Co-authored eight lab guides used by 100+ students
Streamlined autograding workflow, saving 30% TA time
responsibilities: Managed course repositories and CI for autograding
